'''Kate Madison''' (born [[1978]]) is a British filmmaker and actress. She was the director of and an actor in the fan film ''[[Born of Hope]]''. In the film, she portrayed Elgarain, a [[Rangers of the North|Ranger]] and close friend of [[Arathorn II|Arathorn]]. Notably, Elgarain is an original character created specifically for the film and does not appear in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]].
